attributes.action: Prevent Corruption; Make MPs Declare Assets
attributes.additional_details:
MPs have to declare their financial interests, but this does not inclue their assets, leaving an open an opportunity for self-serving corruption, without the public being aware

MPs with shares in Oil companies could be blocking green energy plans, with shares in tobacco companies blocking anti-smoking legislation, with shares in anything and voting with the sole intention of serving that interest, and we would never know.

This needs fixing.

Sign this petition
